attributes.action: Delay indefinitely triggering Article 50 leading to Britain leaving the EU
attributes.additional_details:
It will further result in an increase in anti immigrant, racist actions by the far right across Europe.
We have already seen evidence of this in the murder of an MP.
attributes.background: It is unachievable without causing unacceptable amounts of suffering for  the citizens of the UK the eventual break up of the UK and possibly even the EU itself.
